summary: New characters: The Old Cabinetmaker And His Family, Varvara Ivanovna, Varvara, The Man Of Forty Five, Pyotr Fyodorovich Smerdyakov, Makarov Joseph and 5 more. New connections: Alyosha–Kolya (interest), Maria–Dmitri (landlady), Alyosha–The (acquaintance), Alyosha–Varvara (other) and 10 more.
summary_short: Introduces The Old Cabinetmaker And His Family, Varvara Ivanovna, Varvara, The Man Of Forty Five, and 7 others. Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (37 ties). Key relationship types: child, family.
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (37), Dmitri Karamazov (30), Fyodor Karamazov (25), Ivan Karamazov (24)
Key ties: Alyosha–Kolya (interest), Maria–Dmitri (landlady), Alyosha–The (acquaintance), Alyosha–Varvara (other), +10 more
New characters: The, Varvara, Varvara, The, Pyotr, Makarov, +5 more
story_summary: Alyosha visits his brother Dmitri's acquaintances but finds Dmitri absent and meets Captain Snegiryov and his family instead. The captain angrily discusses an incident where Dmitri's son bit a schoolboy, who is also present and ill. After introductions and emotional exchanges, the captain insists on speaking with Alyosha outside, leading them to leave the room together.
evidence_quotes: He drew him out of the room into the street.
